profile_summary:
As a Senior CVML Engineer with extensive experience in utilizing **Python**, **C++**, and machine learning frameworks such as **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Keras**, I excel in developing advanced computer vision and deep learning solutions. My skill set encompasses cutting-edge technologies for **Object Detection**, **Segmentation**, **Tracking**, and **Scene Understanding**, making me adept at solving complex challenges in computer vision. Over my 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, I have successfully implemented high-performance solutions in sectors like healthcare and finance, emphasizing **algorithm optimization** and leveraging **MLLM** and **GenAI** capabilities. My projects include integrating AI-driven algorithms for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. 

I also bring a profound understanding of designing and deploying robust systems in compliance with standards including HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. My background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation has enabled me to lead the development of secure applications, while my strong analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities facilitate successful project outcomes and enriched team communication.
